title: Did Donald Trump Say It Was ‘Low Class’ for Mike Pence to Bring Pets to Washington?
subtitle: A December 2017 report had the president calling the vice president and his family "yokels" for moving their pets from Indiana.
author: Arturo Garcia
vclaim: President Donald Trump said it was "low-class" of Vice President Mike Pence and his family to move some of their pets to Washington D.C.
